content: a downloadable pdf crochet pattern for a little pocket bag with only one yarn end to work in it is crocheted with a variegated dk acrylic yarn but any yarn weight and fiber can be used it is worked all in on piece crocheting the seams leaving only one yarn end to take care of based on a granny square it is quick and easy to make the choice of yarn and stitches was intended to make a all-in-one-go project that works up quickly and make versatile gifts please note that this is a pattern not the finished product
